infos.value: You can embark with a maximum of five slots filled, such as with units or vision cards.
The total Unit Cost of your formation can be up to 270.
You can embark with a maximum of four slots filled, such as with units or vision cards.
You can embark with a formation of N, R, SR, and MR rarity units.
You can embark with a maximum of four slots filled, such as with units or vision cards, with a total Unit Cost of up to 300.
